mn85:4.3: bodhi kho → bodhi bho gotama (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn85:12.2: upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesī’ti → upasampajja pavedesīti (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn85:12.23: attano → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu | attanā → attano (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn85:12.28: āvuso → āvuso rāma (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
mn85:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṃ ūhananti (bj); muddhānaṃ abhimattheyya (sya-all, km); muddhānaṃ abhimantheyya (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn85:26.6: arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti, Vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj)
mn85:27.5: ajjhohāressāma → ajjhoharissāma (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn85:27.7: ajajjitaṃ → ajaddhukaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); ajjukaṃ (cck) | ajjhohāreyyuṃ → ajjhohareyyuṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn85:44.21: aṇaṇa → anaṇa (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn85:44.22: Desassu → desessu (cck); desetu (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn85:49.21: Andhībhūtasmiṃ → andhabhūtasmiṃ (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed); andhabhūtasmi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
mn85:49.27: tasmāhamupaka → tasmāhaṃ upakā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn85:49.28: hupeyyapāvuso’ti → huveyya pāvusoti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); huveyyāvusoti (sya-all, km)
mn85:55.5: aṅkusagayhe → aṅkusagaṇhe (sya-all, km) | hatthārūḷhe → hatthāruyhe (bj); haṭṭhārūyhe (pts-vp-pli1ed)
